featured.text: This north-south preference has also been noted in flies, termites and honeybees.

definition.zh_def: 蜜蜂，一種社會性昆蟲，以花蜜和花粉為食，並能製造蜂蜜。
definition.en_def: A honeybee is a social insect that feeds on nectar and pollen and produces honey.
definition.example: The honeybee plays a crucial role in pollinating flowers.
